gate.yahoo
Class YahooSearch

java.lang.Object
  gate.yahoo.YahooSearch

public class YahooSearch
extends Object

Java API to perform a web search. This code is taken from YAHOO website, which describes how to use YAHOO engine.

Author:
Ryan Kennedy
